name: bellflower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a family of plants with blue, purple, white, or pink bell-shaped flowers: Beautifully coloured bellflowers and foxgloves grew along the line of the hedge. The harebell is a beautiful, delicate bellflower.
More examplesFewer examplesCampanulas, otherwise known as bellflowers, are perennials that will brighten any garden.This particular, deep purple variety of bellflower grows in huge numbers in the forests in this area.The bellflowers that you see around here are nearly always blue or purple so it was nice to find these pink ones.
